news.  Authorities were present to regulate
traffic and investigate the cause of the
accident. Last night, Ho Chi Minh City District 3 police
urgently arrested an
inter-district loan sharking group
operating from 2021 to present in Ho Chi Minh City.  The
main districts are District 8 and District 6. When they cannot collect
money, they use the trick of carving paint
or pouring dirt into the debtor's house. The
arrested group includes Phan Minh Hoang Le
Viet Anh Tran Vo Khuong An born in the same year
and Vu Minh Hieu born in the same year.  In 1998, they all lived
in the city where the victim was a family of a woman
living in Ward 19 whose younger sister borrowed 7 million
VND every day to pay 350,000 items. However,
5 days after picking them up, they lost the ability to
pay back, so they were threatened by the subjects.
Through investigation, the police determined that
the gang responsible for the crime was led by Hoang, so they
arrested Hoang. He declared that he had spent 100 million
VND on loans that Hoang had distributed to people
in many places and sent his juniors to the
place to identify them.
During the investigation process, the
police confiscated 32 kg of C, five
3-liter paint buckets, one used bucket, a
5-liter jar of shrimp paste, one laptop, eight
cell phones, and many other things.

victim of this group. Please

Before July 2023, he went to

or receive payment via bank account.

Updated information in the early hours of the night.
This morning Vietnam time, the armed group
Hamas said it had released two American hostages
captured during the group's attack
on southern Israel. Israel also
confirmed this information and said these two people are
currently in
Israel.  According to a spokesman for
Hamas's armed branch, the group released the two
hostages for humanitarian purposes after
mediation efforts from Qatar. Israel identified the
two hostages as five-year-old Judit Ranan
and her 17-year-old daughter, Natalie Ranan.
Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office said
Israel is committed to continuing to locate
and bring home all the
hostages. Qatar's Foreign Ministry spokesman
said the two American hostages were released after several
days of continuous communication between all  All
sides in this country hope that the negotiations
will lead to the release of all civilian hostages of
all nationalities. The US
welcomed the release of the two hostages.
President Joe Biden expressed his
gratitude to Qatar.  and Israel, while
Secretary of State Anthony Blinken said there
are still 10 American citizens missing in the

some graphite products to protect safety.
National security and interest graphite is an
important mineral for the production of
batteries for

will take effect from December 1 and
apply to natural and synthetic graphites.
exporters will

intended use of the Chinese regulations
announced just days after the US
imposed a number of additional measures to
restrict US companies from selling  High-tech chips
to China lead scale is the
main component for electric vehicle batteries, on
average each vehicle requires about 50 to 100 kg. It is
also used in
other industries, the demand for
this material is increasing day by day.  The world is

2018. China is the
world's leading graphite producer, accounting for 2/3 of
global supply.
China's synthetic graphite exports in the first 9 months of

over the previous period in 2022.

a large research group in the UK.  has
developed a technology that allows
affecting electrical signals deep inside the brain
without the need for surgery.
Initial tests show that this technology
can improve memory, raising
hopes for the ability  Improve symptoms
of
Anzer's disease New technology from scientists
at the Dr Dementia Research Institute
in the UK uses electrodes attached to the outside of the
scalp. These electrodes create two
overlapping electric fields at one point.  selected points
deep in the brain thereby changing the
brain's electrical activity based on this technology.
AZ treatment may not require stimulation
in the brain as
before, the stimulation intensity is the same as when
you hold a 9V battery between  finger
Most participants did not feel
anything In the future we are unlikely to
have a single method to treat
alzer so this new method of nerve stimulation
will probably be combined with
several drugs
This technology has been
successfully tested on 20 healthy volunteers
and scientists are
continuing to research and test it further
while designing a head-worn device that is easier to
use.  For

I like the feeling of being in the church. It
